We Represent Victims Of Head-On Collisions

The terror of seeing a vehicle cross the center lane and head straight for you is not an experience most people would care to endure. For those who survive such an accident, that moment is just the beginning of what can be a long and harrowing ordeal.

Devastating Injuries From Head-On Car Collisions

Head-on collisions can cause devastating injuries. Individuals involved in head-on collisions often suffer:

  • Spinal cord injuries
  • Head trauma
  • Broken bones
  • Chest injuries
  • Whiplash/neck injuries
  • Abdominal injuries

Air bags that are supposed to protect you from injury in a car accident sometimes cause injury, too. Faulty air bags can deploy too forcefully, blowing shrapnel into the cabin of a car and causing severe burns, broken bones and bruises. There have been separate product liability lawsuits in these cases.

One Reason Why You Need An Experienced Attorney: High Medical Costs

The medical costs required to address these head-on car accident injuries can quickly spiral out of control. If you or a loved one has been injured or died in a head-on collision in Ohio, the effects on your life can be immeasurable.

Due to such long-lasting effects, you should never try to resolve these matters on your own.

An insurance company may give you an offer that sounds tempting, but it is likely less than what you deserve. Don’t agree to anything until you talk to a personal injury attorney.

Using Over 100 Years Of Combined Experience To Help You Recover Maximum Compensation

At Lamkin, Van Eman, Trimble & Dougherty, LLC, it’s our mission to provide committed legal protection when you’ve been injured by someone else’s negligence.

Our attorneys have over 100 years of combined experience getting compensation for victims of head-on collisions to pay for medical bills, pain and suffering, property damage, and other expenses that add up after an accident.

Sometimes these accidents can prove deadly, leaving loved ones grieving and without income. Our lawyers can’t turn back time to avoid the crash, but we can help you recover fair and full compensation to help you continue on after a serious accident and regain some control over your life.

Don’t Settle For Less Than You Deserve. Call Today.

Call 614-360-2706 today to schedule your free initial consultation at our Columbus office. You can also contact us via our email form.
